SELECT apply.id,apply.clinicno,apply.patientname,apply.gender,apply.age, patient.mobile,user.nickname as doctorname, pre.fee,pre.isdispensing,pre.ispaid,pre.createat as diagnosedate from t_b_apply apply JOIN t_b_prescription pre on apply.id = pre.applyid JOIN t_b_patient patient on apply.patientid = patient.id JOIN t_p_s_user user on pre.createby = user.id
and apply.orgcode = #{orgCode}
and (apply.patientname like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') or patient.mobile like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%'))
and pre.ispaid = '0'
and pre.ispaid = '1' and pre.isdispensing = '0'
and pre.ispaid = '2'
and pre.isdispensing = '1'
select count(1) from t_b_apply where orgcode = #{orgCode}

SELECT COUNT(t1.id) chuZhen,COUNT(t2.id) fuZhen ,(COUNT(t1.id) + COUNT(t2.id) ) as total FROM t_b_apply t1 LEFT JOIN t_b_apply AS t2 ON t2.orgcode = t1.orgcode WHERE t1.orgcode = #{orgCode} AND t1.isfirst = 1 AND t2.isfirst = 0 AND t1.ispaid = 1 AND t2.ispaid = 1
